English: lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money

d.a: `不名一錢~,`不名一文~,`囊空如洗~,`身無分文~
q: 《`兒女英雄傳~．`第~`五~`回~》：「`再~`要~`講~`到~`夜間~`嚴謹~`門戶~，`不怕~`你~`腰纏萬貫~，`落了~`店~`都~`是~`店家~`的~`干係~，`用不著~`客人~`自己~`費心~。」

English: lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money
